error.signature: Invalid hook call. Hooks can only be called inside the body of a function component
error.regex: Invalid hook call.*Hooks can only be called inside

verdict.summary: Hook called outside a component, in a class component, or with multiple React copies.

dead_ends.action: Convert class component to function component just for hooks
dead_ends.why_fails: If the class has complex lifecycle, conversion may introduce bugs

dead_ends.action: Call hooks inside event handlers or callbacks
dead_ends.why_fails: Hooks must be at the top level, not inside conditions or callbacks

workarounds.action: Ensure hooks are called at the top level of a function component
Check for duplicate React versions in node_modules
